title: How to Take Pictures on Android

steps.title: Launch the camera app.
steps.content: Launch the camera app. Most of the time, the camera app icon can be found on the home screen. If you cannot find the camera-shaped icon there, simply launch the app drawer, usually located at the lower right of the dock. Look for the camera app among the numerous apps in there.

steps.title: Enable/disable flash.
steps.content: Enable/disable flash. On the settings panel located at one of the corners of the screen, you will see some icons displayed. Look for the thunder shaped icon to enable/disable the flash feature. Tap on it to choose from On or Off.

steps.title: Focus.
steps.content: Focus. Tap on the subject you would like to capture to focus the camera on it.

steps.title: Take the picture.
steps.content: Take the picture. Tap on the shutter button located at the middle of the right/left side of the screen to capture. Make sure to be motionless because moving may create blurs on your image.

steps.title: Preview the image.
steps.content: Preview the image. If you want to view the image you just took, simply touch the small icon at the upper left (landscape/horizontal) or lower left (portrait/vertical) of the screen.

steps.title: Open the camera application.
steps.content: Open the camera application. Find the camera app on your home screen or app drawer. The icon resembles a camera; tap to open.

steps.title: Reverse the camera.
steps.content: Reverse the camera. In the top right hand corner of the screen you will see an icon of a camera, with two arrows pointing in opposite directions. Tap on this icon and the camera will reverse. You should now be able to see yourself on the screen.

steps.title: Focus your shot.
steps.content: Focus your shot. Tap the screen to focus on whatever you're taking a picture of. In this instance it can be you, or anything that is within the view of the reverse camera.

steps.title: Take your picture.
steps.content: Take your picture. Tap the shutter button in the bottom middle of the screen.

steps.title: Access your image.
steps.content: Access your image. Tap the small box in the bottom left hand corner to access the picture(s) taken.
